devdoc.details: This contract is to be used as a diamond facet (see ERC2535 Diamond Standard https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2535).Note: This facet depends on {ProxyAdminFacet}, and {InterfaceDetectionFacet}.

params.value: The amount of tokens to transfer.
The amount of tokens to transfer.

params.role: The role the caller is missing.

initERC1155DeliverableStorage().details: Reverts with {NotProxyAdmin} if the sender is not the proxy admin.

safeDeliver(address[],uint256[],uint256[.details: Reverts with {NotRoleHolder} if the sender does not have the 'minter' role.

params.data: Optional data to send along to a receiver contract.
params.ids: Identifiers of the tokens to mint.
params.recipients: Addresses of the new tokens owners.

devdoc.title: ERC1155 Multi Token Standard, optional extension: Deliverable (facet version).

ERC1155BalanceOverflow(address,uint256,u.notice: Thrown when minting or transferring an amount of tokens that would overflow the recipient's balance.

ERC1155MintToAddressZero().notice: Thrown when minting tokens to the zero address.

ERC1155SafeTransferRejected(address,uint.notice: Thrown when a safe transfer is rejected by the recipient contract.

IllegalInterfaceId().notice: Thrown when setting the illegal interfaceId 0xffffffff.

InconsistentArrayLengths().notice: Thrown when the multiple related arrays have different lengths.

NotProxyAdmin(address).notice: Thrown when an account is not the proxy admin but is required to.

NotRoleHolder(bytes32,address).notice: Thrown when an account does not have the required role.

TransferSingle(address,address,address,u.notice: Emitted when some token is transferred.

initERC1155DeliverableStorage().notice: Marks the following ERC165 interfaces as supported: ERC1155Deliverable.

safeDeliver(address[],uint256[],uint256[.notice: Safely mints tokens to multiple recipients.
